QuestData.Title: The Final Song
QuestData.Description:
Servitors do not possess the strength to restore the repositories. Nevertheless, the task must be completed.
The mortal must stay close to protect the restoration process.
Come.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stay near Kodah while keeping enemies away to capture the Protoform Repository.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Tahli in the Protoform Repository.
QuestData.RewardText: I should have obeyed the elders! This is all my fault!
